info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:51PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS AND NORTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI AND ST. LOUIS CITY... At 251 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Riverview, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Louis, University City, Granite City, Ferguson, Clayton, Jennings, Bellefontaine Neighbors, Richmond Heights, Dellwood, Normandy, Northwoods, Madison, Riverview, Venice, Hillsdale, Cool Valley, Spanish Lake, Pagedale, Pine Lawn, and Moline Acres. This also includes Scott Joplin Historic Site. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
